ConfigParam.Description: translate("#LDS#Submit a request for an account if the account is missing")

LoadTable.WhereClause: -- find account def format("uid_tsbaccountdef in ( select t.uid_tsbaccountdef from tsbaccountdef t join unsroot r on r.uid_tsbaccountdef = t.uid_tsbaccountdef join unsgroup ug on ug.uid_unsroot = r.uid_unsroot where ug.uid_unsgroup = '{0}') and not ({1})", from unsgroup select top 1 uid_unsgroup, sqlempty("uid_accproduct", "string", "NonUnicodeLiterals"))

ActionSequence.Condition: (0 < (from TSBAccountDef select count())) and (IsOrderable(from TSBAccountDef select top 1 UID_AccProduct, from PersonsForOrder select current UID_Person))

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: if(from PersonsForOrder select current (UID_Person=getuser())) then translate("#LDS#You do not currently have an account in the system {0}. Would you like to request an account?", from unsgroup select top 1 displayvalue(uid_unsroot)) else translate("#LDS#The employee {0} does not have an account in the system {1}. Would you like to request an account for {0}?", from PersonsForOrder select current display(), from unsgroup select top 1 displayvalue(uid_unsroot))

Function.Name: IsOrderable(string uidAccProduct, string uidPerson)
